title: Interaction Analysis Between Facebook Utilization and Learning Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Kolb's learning style theory and Facebook usage experience
context.additional_context: A project-based course exploring SNS utilization strategies within the mathematics curriculum.

learning_goals: One can distinguish between learning style types (adaptive, convergent, assimilative, and divergent) and diagnose their own style.
One can analyze the correlation between Facebook usage patterns and learning outcomes using experimental data.
One can incorporate three proposed strategies for integrating Facebook into mathematics learning design into a report.

resources: Kolb LSI Learning Style Inventory Tool

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
